name: Spirit Cross
description:
Hello! This is my entry for the Interstellar Game Jam (Theme: Another Dimension), Spirit Cross! It's a 3D platformer that requires switching between two dimensions to reach your objective. 

These are the third party assets I got from outside Unity:
Cavilant font
Kloppenheim 02 (Pure Sky) HDRI
Kloofendal 48d Partly Cloudy (Pure Sky) HDRI

All assets above are available for personal use. Both HDRIs are under CC0, and the font is "Free for personal, non-profit use".

Controls:

WASD - Move
Space - Jump (you can double jump!)
Shift - Sprint
Mouse click - Cross dimensions (can be used mid-air)
